Name: enforce_project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost must not exceed the project's allocated budget.

Name: enforce_scrum_team_size
Description: The size of any given team must be within the typical Scrum limits (e.g.

Name: assign_only_active_workers
Description: A worker can only be assigned to tasks if their status is 'active'.

Name: require_feature_priority
Description: A feature cannot be scheduled into a release without an assigned priority level.

Name: must_have_product_owner
Description: A project must have an assigned Product Owner to be considered valid.

Name: require_story_point_estimation
Description: A user story must have story points assigned before being included in a sprint.

Name: worker_availability_is_positive
Description: A worker must have an availability greater than zero to be assigned work.

Name: sprint_must_have_a_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a corresponding Sprint Goal entity defined.

Name: task_effort_must_be_set
Description: Every task in the Sprint Backlog must have its effort estimated.

Name: use_only_active_teams
Description: Work can only be assigned to a team whose status is currently 'active'.

Name: prefer_certified_skills
IsSum: prefer workers whose relevant skills are certified.

Name: avoid_unspecified_task_type
Description: A task should ideally have a defined type (e.g.

Name: cannot_resolve_blocked_task
Description: A task with an active blocker cannot have its status set to 'done'.
